subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Zack Novak made a tie-breaking 3-pointer with one and a half minutes left and Manny Harris followed with a layup to power the host Wolverines to a win over the Huskies.
snippet: Zack Novak made a tie-breaking 3-pointer with one and a half minutes left and Manny Harris followed with a layup to power the host Wolverines to a win over the Huskies.
